general_advisory: Kharif crop 2024: 1. Due to Forecast of Very light to Light rainfall from 28th Sept. farmers are advised to postpone application of fertilizer & chemical during this period. 2. Due to high humidity survey for any insect pest in kharif crops.

advisory: Due to the weather condition, there is chances of Bacterial Leaf Blight, to manage this spray 1 g Streptomycin and 30 g copper oxy chloride per 10 liter of water. Apply 20 kg urea and + 13 kg MOP in Medium and low land condition.
Apply 20kg urea + 13kg MOP per acre in medium and low land condition.
To manage Pod borer in green gram and black gram crop Gramin Krishi Mausam Sewa India Meteorological Department.
When the crop turns 85% maturity go for harvesting and dry it under sun for 2 -3 days.
Due to weather effect, there is chances of Aphids infestation, to manage this spray Imidachloprid @ 0.4 ml/liter of water.
The early sown crop is at maturity stage. Go for harvesting and dry it under sun for 2 -3 days.
Go for intercultivation and apply 55 kg Urea and 33 kg MOP per acre.

To control Fruit and shoot borer in Brinjal Spray Neem based pesticide 1500ppm @600ml/acre at initial stages. If the pests continue ETL, go for alternate spray of Spinosad 45% SC @70ml/acre and Emamectin benzoate @ 80 g /acre at 15 days interval.
There are chances of infestation of Downy Mildew disease in cucurbit vegetables after the heavy rainfall. To manage Downy Mildew disease in cucurbits spray Copper Hydroxide 77 % WP @ 3 g/litre.
